identificationModule.briefTitle: Telmisartan and Amlodipine Fixed Dose Combination [FDC] Trial for the Treatment of Severe Hypertension
identificationModule.officialTitle: An 8-week Randomised, Double-blind Study to Compare the Fixed-dose Combination of Telmisartan 80 mg & Amlodipine 10mg Versus Telmisartan 80 mg Monotherapy or Amlodipine 10 mg Monotherapy as First Line Therapy in Patients With Severe Hypertension (Grade 3).

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The primary objective of this trial is to demonstrate that following eight weeks of treatment the FDC of telmisartan 80 mg plus amlodipine 10 mg (T80/A10) is superior as first line therapy in reducing mean seated trough cuff Systolic Blood Pressure \[SBP\] compared to the monotherapies of telmisartan 80 mg (T80) and amlodipine 10 mg (A10) in patients with severe hypertension. A key secondary objective is to identify the duration of treatment required to demonstrate the superiority of the FDC over both of the monotherapies.

armGroups.label: telmisartan and amlodipine
armGroups.description: telmisartan and amlodipine used in combination vs amlodipine or telmisartan

armGroups.label: amlodipine
armGroups.description: telmisartan and amlodipine used in combination vs amlodipine or telmisartan

armGroups.label: telmisartan
armGroups.description: telmisartan and amlodipine used in combination vs amlodipine or telmisartan

interventions.name: amlodipine
interventions.description: amlodipine 5mg for the first 2w then force titration to Amlodipine 10mg for remaining 6 w

interventions.name: telmisartan
interventions.description: telmisartan 80mg for the 8w, no titration required

interventions.name: telmisartan and amlodipine
interventions.description: telmisartan 80 and amlodipine 5mg for the first 2 weeks, then force titrated to telmisartan 80mg and amlodipine 10mg for the remaining 6w

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria

1. Ability to provide written informed consent in accordance with Good Clinical Practice and local legislation
2. Age 18 years or older
3. Patients with severe hypertension as defined SBP greater than 180 mmHg and DBP greater than 95 mmHg at randomisation
4. Ability to stop any current antihypertensive therapy without unacceptable risk to the patient (Investigators discretion)

Exclusion criteria Mean in-clinic seated cuff SBP \>/= 200 mmHg and/or Diastolic Blood Pressure \[DBP\] \>/= 95 mmHg

groups.title: T80+A10

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Trough Seated Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) at Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Overall mean reduction from a common mean baseline in SBP
outcomeMeasures.populationDescription: Full analysis set (FAS) included all randomised patients who had at least one seated trough cuff SBP following administration of study drug.

groups.title: T80+A10
groups.description: Telmisartan 80 mg plus Amlodipine 10 mg once daily (T80+A10)

analyses.estimateComment: Difference calculated as T80+A10 minus Telmisartan 80 mg
Difference calculated as T80+A10 minus amlodipine 10 mg

adverseEventsModule.timeFrame: First study medication intake, last study medication intake + 6 days

eventGroups.title: T80+A10
eventGroups.description: Telmisartan 80 mg plus Amlodipine 10 mg once daily (T80+A10)

seriousEvents.organSystem: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certainAgreement.otherDetails: Any publication of the result of this trial must be consistent with the Boehringer Ingelheim publication policy. The rights of the investigator and of the sponsor with regard to publication of the results of this trial are described in the investigator contract.
